title.title: BALI RAFTING AND HORSE RIDING TOUR
title.text: BALI RAFTING AND HORSE RIDING TOUR
title.html: BALI RAFTING AND HORSE RIDING TOUR

tagline.title: BALI RAFTING AND HORSE RIDING TOR PACKAGES IS DOUBLE COMBINATION OF ADVENTURE TO ENJOY THE RAFTING ADVENTURE AT AYUNG RIVER AND TO DO HORSE BACK RIDING TOUR
tagline.text: BALI RAFTING AND HORSE RIDING TOR PACKAGES IS DOUBLE COMBINATION OF ADVENTURE TO ENJOY THE RAFTING ADVENTURE AT AYUNG RIVER AND TO DO HORSE BACK RIDING TOUR
tagline.html: BALI RAFTING AND HORSE RIDING TOR PACKAGES IS DOUBLE COMBINATION OF ADVENTURE TO ENJOY THE RAFTING ADVENTURE AT AYUNG RIVER AND TO DO HORSE BACK RIDING TOUR

description.text: Bali Rafting and Horse Riding Tour is an Bali Double Activities Tour Packages to enjoy combo adventure we created during your holiday in Bali islands, Is combination for do the White water rafting adventure at Ayung river and continue do the horse back riding tour. Is great adventure we mixed together to make your expereince more impressive one. First we will try the challenge of white water rafting at Ayung river in northern of Ubud village around 2 hours length, with great view and for sure is Fantastic moment, the rafting guide will lead you to enjoy the rafting and some moment we will stop at small waterfall at the river and allowed you to swim there, and then you will join the group to enjoy lunch buffet Indonesian food we provide for you. After finish lunch our professional Bali Driver will escort you to the Horse Riding stable to enjoy riding an horse for 1 hours 30 minutes duration, will passed the local village and beach, Is amazing experience for do two exciting adventure in one day. The Bali Rafting and Horse Riding Tour will give you impressive experience along with our professional Bali Tour Driver and the private car will complete your journey explore this Islands.

title.title: Bali Ayung River Rafting Tour | Bali Rafting and Horse Riding Tour Packages

image.title: Bali Ayung River Rafting Tour | Bali Rafting and Horse Riding Tour Packages | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Ayung River Rafting Tour is one of white water rafting adventure tour packages we have to enjoy the great challenge of rapids adventure at Ayung River in northern of Ubud village. This river offer amazing experience for your journey to explore the river with amazing panorama view. This river is very suitable for beginner who never try the rafting before but want to try the challenge. During the rafting you will stop at the small waterfall at the river and allowed you to swim at the river. Is an rare experience you will have and the professional rafting guide will always give his maksimun services to make you more enjoyable.

title.title: Bali Horse Riding Tour | Bali Rafting and Horse Riding Tour Packages

image.title: Bali Horse Riding Tour | Bali Rafting and Horse Riding Tour Packages | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Horse Riding Tour packages is the best option for those want to riding an horse in Bali islands. This adventure will give you an rare experience by allowed you to explore the hidden beauty of this islands by riding horse with our professional horseback riding guide. You will see the beauty of the beach from the top of a horse and passed the local village to see the social activities life. The sounds of horses hooves echoing through the crashing waves of the beach and take a unique look at Balinese life as you pass the local village. Is amazing experience you will remember for all your life.
description.html: Bali Horse Riding Tour packages is the best option for those want to riding an horse in Bali islands. price.title: Bali Rafting and Horse Riding Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Rafting and Horse Riding Tour Price :

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,450,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 1,100,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 1,000,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 975,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 950.000/person

Note :

  • Get Special price for group booking

Bali Rafting and Horse Riding Tour Price Include :

  • Private Car with Clean, Comfortable and Good A/C condition
  • English Speaking Driver
  • Petrol
  • Safety and Well Maintenance Equipment's
  • Rafting at Ayung River
  • 1 hours 30 minutes Horse Riding Tour
  • Professional Ayung Rafting and Horse Riding Guide
  • Lunch buffet Indonesian Food
  • Mineral Water
  • Insurance Coverage

itinerary.title: Bali Rafting and Horse Riding Tour Itinerary :

content.event: Enjoy Rafting Adventure at Ayung River
Lunch finish and continue the tour
Enjoy 1 hours 30 minutes Horse Riding Tour
Horse Riding Tour finish and Back to hotel

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.
